rows.label: qst702409_msg0001
rows.name:
Lieutenant! How goes? I think we've
spoken to all people of promise
in the whole of the capital.

rows.label: qst702409_msg0002
rows.name: Oh! Thank you, Adel-sama, everyone!

rows.label: qst702409_msg0003
rows.name:
Unfortunately, it is yet
unclear as to who of them will
actually answer the call...

rows.label: qst702409_msg0004
rows.name:
But I think that if anyone were to come,
they should most likely do so soon. Do
you mind if we wait for them here?

rows.label: qst702409_msg0005
rows.name:
I'd quite like to see if the people
I selected will ultimately meet
with your approval, Lieutenant.

rows.label: qst702409_msg0006
rows.name: Of course, my Lord. I'll be honored.

rows.label: qst702409_msg0007
rows.name:
Hey, dudes! So I totally couldn't
shake the image of you all being
cool in the capital, so, here I am.

rows.label: qst702409_msg0008
rows.name:
Thank you for choosing the
militia! I had a good feeling
about you from the start, friend.

rows.label: qst702409_msg0009
rows.name:
So these are the militia
barracks, then?

rows.label: qst702409_msg0010
rows.name:
Sweet! The Iiran army's HQ's got
nothing on this bad boy of a wall!
Looking good, looking good...

rows.label: qst702409_msg0011
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Maggot! You'll mind your language
when talking to your superiors,
or you'll get the lash!

rows.label: qst702409_msg0012
rows.name: Gwah! Who's this mean old bag?!

rows.label: qst702409_msg0013
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]What did I just say?! I'll
show you who I am, and God
help you if you forget!!!

rows.label: qst702409_msg014
rows.name:
Adel...? Was this Veronica
there all along, or is this
her evil twin sister...?

rows.label: qst702409_msg015
rows.name:
Ah, you see, she was an Invidian army
sergeant in her past life. That's the
only way she knows to talk to her men.

rows.label: qst702409_msg016
rows.name:
At least there will be
discipline... I suppose...

rows.label: qst702409_msg017
rows.name: So who do you think you are, then?!

rows.label: qst702409_msg018
rows.name:
Right! Sorry! I'm Luc, and I wanna
join up if that's all right by you!

rows.label: qst702409_msg019
rows.name:
This is the army, you dog! You
will call me "Ma'am" at all
times! Is that understood?

rows.label: qst702409_msg020
rows.name: Y-yes, Ma'am!

rows.label: qst702409_msg021
rows.name:
You learn quick, at least. I'll make
a soldier out of you yet. All right
then, you're in! Run along now!

rows.label: qst702409_msg022
rows.name: Yes, Ma'am! Right away, Ma'am!

rows.label: qst702409_msg023
rows.name: Adel...are we sure this is OK...?

rows.label: qst702409_msg024
rows.name:
Uh, well... I think she
likes him, actually. I
imagine things will work out!

rows.label: qst702409_msg026
rows.name:
This is Isabella. An adventurer,
formerly blessed with quite
a restless spirit.

rows.label: qst702409_msg027
rows.name:
You're the Boss here, right? Looking
forward to serving with you.

rows.label: qst702409_msg028
rows.name:
Right, right... Well, if Adel-sama
thinks you have what it takes, then I
cannot argue. You should do nicely.

rows.label: qst702409_msg029
rows.name:
I hope this whole militia
thing doesn't prove a massive
waste of my talents!

rows.label: qst702409_msg030
rows.name: That makes two new recruits, then...

rows.label: qst702409_msg031
rows.name:
This is like pulling teeth... You
really think we'll make it to six?

rows.label: qst702409_msg032
rows.name:
Mo-mo-mo... Is not over until
Nopon lady sing! In this case,
is refer to arrival of us!

rows.label: qst702409_msg033
rows.name:
Oh, look! The Nopon siblings
have decided to show up!

rows.label: qst702409_msg034
rows.name:
A bunch of Nopon? I see, I see...
Quite a shrewd idea, Adel-sama,
nabbing us four at once.

rows.label: qst702409_msg035
rows.name: What're your names, fluffdogs?

rows.label: qst702409_msg036
rows.name:
Mo-mo... I quite happy you ask.
Grant Ryuuryuu ear of friends,
then, and Ryuuryuu will happily...

rows.label: qst702409_msg037
rows.name:
No, stop right there! I don't
care now. What are those
outfits you're wearing?!

rows.label: qst702409_msg038
rows.name:
Mo mo?! Ryuuryuu just trying
to answer question... Please
to ask questions one at time!

rows.label: qst702409_msg039
rows.name:
You need a serious attitude adjustment,
and I'll think I'll start with your clothes.
Get into uniform, right the hell now!

rows.label: qst702409_msg040
rows.name: Y-y-y-yes, Ma'am-pon!

rows.label: qst702409_msg042
rows.name: D-does uniform make Ryuuryuu look fat?

rows.label: qst702409_msg043
rows.name: Hm. It'll suffice.

rows.label: qst702409_msg044
rows.name:
But don't think your lives
won't change, now that
you've joined our ranks.

rows.label: qst702409_msg045
rows.name:
You might not be fighters,
but I'll make damn sure to
whip you into shape!

rows.label: qst702409_msg046
rows.name:
Eeeek! Scary lady is scary! Could
maybe tone down the scary...?

rows.label: qst702409_msg047
rows.name: Quiet now while lady talking!

rows.label: qst702409_msg048
rows.name:
First, you'll clean up this whole
base. And if you miss a spot,
I'll dock your food allowance.

rows.label: qst702409_msg049
rows.name:
Y-yes, understand! All right,
Nopon have to work hard! No food
to eat is fate worse than death!

rows.label: qst702409_msg050
rows.name: I hope those four will be OK...

rows.label: qst702409_msg051
rows.name:
I wouldn't worry. I've got the
feeling they'll quickly learn to
use their restlessness for good.

rows.label: qst702409_msg052
rows.name: This may bring out the best in them.

rows.label: qst702409_msg053
rows.name:
So, Adel-sama. It seems all six of
the new recruits you've found us
are men and women of substance.

rows.label: qst702409_msg054
rows.name:
I think these reinforcements will
serve to improve the militia's
fighting spirit immeasurably.

rows.label: qst702409_msg055
rows.name:
Now, we may not be able to return here
for a good while, Lieutenant. I trust you
to keep things running in my absence!

rows.label: qst702409_msg056
rows.name:
Count on it, Lord! Safe
travels, and we'll all see
you on the other side!
